The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Category:Head items

Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Gloves
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Goggles
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Helms, hats, masks etc.

Helms are objects that go on your head. They can have various Clothing enhancements found assigned randomly or they could be on of the named drops in the list below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Skull Fetish Mask
  • Charisma +6 Charisma +6: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Void Lore IIIVoid Lore III: Passive: Your Negative Energy and Poison spells gain a 13% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
 9 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Titan Awakes Raid Warded chest
Graskitch's Skullcap
  • Will Save +3 Will Save +3: This item gives a +3 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lost Seekers
Puzzle Cap
  • Intelligence +2 Intelligence +2: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
 None Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Seal of Shan-To-Kor
Headman's Hood
  • FearFear
    Caster level: 7
    Charges: 1 (1/day)     — 1 Charges (Recharged/Day:1)
  • Intimidate +9Intimidate +9: Passive: +9 Competence bonus to the Intimidate skill.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action

    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Yarkuch's Helm
  • Charisma +1 Charisma +1: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +1 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Will Save +2 Will Save +2: This item gives a +2 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.
  • Intelligence +1 Intelligence +1: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +1 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
 5 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Assault on Splinterskull

Helm of the Mroranon
  • Wisdom +5 Wisdom +5: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Intimidate +11Intimidate +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Intimidate skill.
  • Incite +56 Incite +56: +56% Enhancement bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage
  • Command +4Command: Passive: +4 Insight bonus on Charisma based skill checks. Command armor and command shields make their owners very noticeable, imposing a -6 penalty on Hide checks.
  • Mroranon's MightMroranon's Might: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +1 Artifact bonus to Strength
    +5 Artifact bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
  • Immunity to FearImmunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
 9 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Plane of Night Raid Warded chest

Shining Crest of St. Markus
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Silver Flame Lore +12%Silver Flame Lore +12: Passive: Your Positive, Light, and Alignment spells gain a 12% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Power of the Silver Flame +80Power of the Silver Flame +80: Passive: +80 Equipment bonus to Positive, Light, and Alignment Spell Power.
  • Light Absorption +15% Light Absorption +15%: Passive: 15% Enhancement Bonus to Light Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Oasis of MoralityOasis of Morality: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +2% Artifact bonus to Positive Spellcrit Chance
    +10 Artifact bonus to Positive Spellpower
    +5% Artifact bonus to Fortification Bypass

Minos Legens
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Seraphim
  • SacredSacred: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.
  • Hallowed +2Hallowed: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Hallowed items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to the maximum Hit Dice of undead turned.
  • Abjuration Focus +1 Abjuration Focus +1: +1 Equipment bonus to the DC of Abjuration spells.
  • Devotion +66Devotion +66: Passive: +66 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.
 11 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Tattered Tapestries
Totemic Lavalier
  • MagiMagi: This item grants the wearer +100 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Intelligence +6 Intelligence +6: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
  • Charisma +6 Charisma +6: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

  • Lesser HeightenLesser Heighten
    Caster level: 12

  • Upgradeable Item (Black Abbot)Upgradeable Item (Black Abbot): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Black Abbot to combine it with. Bring this item to the Fountain of Necrotic Might outside the Black Mausoleum and combine it with a Seal of the Black Abbot to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.

  • Potency +49Potency +49: Passive: +49 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.
  • Hallowed +6Hallowed: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Hallowed items provide an +6 Enhancement bonus to the maximum Hit Dice of undead turned.
  • Sacred +6Sacred +6: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +6 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.
  • TurningTurning : This will increase the total number of Turn Undead attempts you can use by 3. However, these additional Turn Undead attempts will only take effect after the wielder rests.

  • Enchantable: Crystal RushEnchantable: Crystal Rush: This hat can be enchanted to bestow one of various benefits to nearby kobolds in Crystal Cove.
  • Enchantable: Adventuring BonusEnchantable: Adventuring Bonus: This hat can be enchanted to bestow one of various benefits useful in general adventuring. Adventuring effects may change the minimum level of this item.
  • Enchantable: Skilled SeamanEnchantable: Skilled Seaman: This hat can be enchanted to grant a bonus to one skill. You can have one skill bonus on a hat at a time, but can replace it with a different choice. Skill effects may change the minimum level of this item.

Epic Sacred Helm
  • Lifesealed +27Lifesealed +27: You are immune to magical effects that cause instant death. In addition, you have a +27 enhancement bonus to Negative Energy Absorption.
  • Hallowed +9Hallowed: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Hallowed items provide an +9 Enhancement bonus to the maximum Hit Dice of undead turned.
  • Sacred +9Sacred +9: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +9 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.
  • Radiance GuardRadiance Guard: This item is imbued with a brilliant, radiant power. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, the attacker has a chance of being hit by 4d6 points of light damage and has a chance of being blinded.
  • Negative Energy AbsorptionNegative Energy Absorption: This effect absorbs negative energy and energy drain effects.

Tainted Helm of Mystery
  • Taint of EvilTaint of Evil: Good aligned characters equipping this item suffer a temporary negative level until the item is removed.
  • A Mysterious Effect - can be any one of these 4 sets:
    • Dexterity +3 Dexterity +3: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +3 enhancement bonus to Dexterity. and Resistance +3 Resistance +3: Passive: +3 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.

    • Constitution +3 Constitution +3: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +3 enhancement bonus to Constitution. and Spell Penetration I Spell Penetration I: Passive: +1 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.

Green Steel Helm
  • Taint of ShavarathTaint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons can sate their bloodlust on opponents, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed upon the wearer. Perhaps there is a way to cleanse this item...

    Caster level: 16

    • Named: Category:Green augments

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

    • Fortification: +25% to +100%

    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11

  • Constitution +7 Constitution +7: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Constitution.

Helm of the Black Dragon (Level 25)
  • Draconic FerocityDraconic Ferocity: While the Item:Helm of the Black Dragon ML23/24/25 is equipped at the same time as a Flawless Black Dragonscale Armor, you will gain a +3% artifact bonus to melee Doublestrike chance and a +2 artifact bonus to damage with ranged or thrown weapons.
  • One of the following ability bonuses:
    • Constitution +8 Constitution +8: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
    • Insightful Constitution +3Insightful Constitution +3: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +3 insight bonus to Constitution.
    • Dexterity +8 Dexterity +8: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
    • Insightful Dexterity +3Insightful Dexterity +3: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +3 insight bonus to Dexterity.
    • Strength +8 Strength +8: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Strength.
    • Insightful Strength +3Insightful Strength +3: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +3 insight bonus to Strength.

    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Dragon Masque
  • DeceptionDeception: This weapon is hard to focus upon and thus provides a +3 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, Deception weapons have a small chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
    , Orange Augment Slot: EmptyOrange Augments
    • Named: Category:Orange augments
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Red Augments
    • Named: Category:Red augments
    • DR bypass: Alignment, Material
    • Elemental damage: +1d6 to +9d6
    • Spell Power (Enhancement bonus): +38 to +153
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
    , or Purple Augment Slot: EmptyPurple Augments
    • Named: Category:Purple augments
    Red Augments
    • Named: Category:Red augments
    • DR bypass: Alignment, Material
    • Elemental damage: +1d6 to +9d6
    • Spell Power (Enhancement bonus): +38 to +153
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
    )
  • Unbreakable AdamancyUnbreakable Adamancy: This item is part of the Unbreakable Adamancy set.
    When two items from this set are equipped, you gain a +5 Luck bonus to PRR and MRR.
 27 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Desecrated Temple of Vol (epic) End chest
Mythic Seraphim
  • SacredSacred: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.
  • Hallowed +2Hallowed: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Hallowed items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to the maximum Hit Dice of undead turned.
  • Insightful FaithInsightful Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Insightful Faith items provide Insight Bonuses to the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, their maximum Hit Dice turned by +2, and their total Hit Dice turned by +4.
  • Devotion +144Devotion +144: Passive: +144 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.
  • Deathblock VIIIDeathblock VIII: Passive: 24% Enhancement Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.
  • Silver FlameSilver Flame: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. The cleansing power of the Silver Flame increase the total Hit Dice of undead turned by +6.
  • Unbreakable AdamancyUnbreakable Adamancy: This item is part of the Unbreakable Adamancy set.
    When two items from this set are equipped, you gain a +5 Luck bonus to PRR and MRR.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Bring this item to the Fountain of Necrotic Might outside the Black Mausoleum and combine it with Item:Epic Tapestry Shreds to upgrade the item. (Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

Epic Seraphim
  • SacredSacred: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.
  • Hallowed +2Hallowed: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Hallowed items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to the maximum Hit Dice of undead turned.
  • Insightful FaithInsightful Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Insightful Faith items provide Insight Bonuses to the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, their maximum Hit Dice turned by +2, and their total Hit Dice turned by +4.
  • Devotion +144Devotion +144: Passive: +144 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.
  • Deathblock VIIDeathblock VII: Passive: 21% Enhancement Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.
  • Unbreakable AdamancyUnbreakable Adamancy: This item is part of the Unbreakable Adamancy set.
    When two items from this set are equipped, you gain a +5 Luck bonus to PRR and MRR.

Epic Emerald Gaze
  • Intimidate +20Intimidate +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Intimidate skill.
  • Shatter +12Shatter +12: This effect gives a +12 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved Sunder attempts.
  • Insightful Will Save +2Insightful Will Save +2: This item gives a +2 Insight bonus to your Will saves.
  • Immunity to FearImmunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
  • Strength +11 Strength +11: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +11 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Tendon Slice 6%Tendon Slice 6%: This effect gives a 6% chance to Hamstring the target for each attack that does damage.
  • Unbreakable AdamancyUnbreakable Adamancy: This item is part of the Unbreakable Adamancy set.
    When two items from this set are equipped, you gain a +5 Luck bonus to PRR and MRR.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Epic Mushroom Cap
  • Proof Against Poison +10 Proof Against Poison +10: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +10 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 11 + their Fortitude save).
  • Deathblock VIIIDeathblock VIII: Passive: 24% Enhancement Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.
  • Good Luck +3Good Luck +3: This item gives a +3 Luck bonus to all saves and skill checks.
  • Superior False LifeSuperior False Life: This item grants the wearer +40 maximum health.
 26 UnboundUnbound: This item is Unbound, and may take permanent damage. ToEE: Water Node Jotun Rimeblade chest (Confirmed), ToEE: Earth Node, Hyrelgas chest (Confirmed), ToEE: Air Node, dragon's hoard chests, and ToEE: Fire Node, Periron chest
Mushroom Cap
  • Proof Against Poison +6 Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Deathblock IIDeathblock II: Passive: 6% Enhancement Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.
  • Good Luck +1Good Luck +1: This item gives a +1 Luck bonus to all saves and skill checks.
  • False LifeFalse Life: This item grants the wearer +10 maximum health.

Legendary Green Steel Helm
  • Legendary Taint of ShavarathLegendary Taint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons feed their bloodlust on enemies, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the Legendary Taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed more and more upon the wielder. Perhaps there is a way to appease this item...

Executioner's Helm
  • Insightful Deception +1Insightful Deception +1: +1 Insight bonus to hit and +2 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
  • Seeker +5 Seeker +5: Provides a +5 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +5 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Quality Combat Mastery +1Quality Combat Mastery +1: +1 Quality bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.

Drow Sage's Cowl
  • Wisdom +7 Wisdom +7: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • True SeeingTrue Seeing: Passive: You gain the benefit of the spell True Seeing.
  • Competence Healing Amplification +29Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +29 (Competence bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Will Save +7 Will Save +7: This item gives a +7 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.

  • Nearly FinishedNearly Finished: This item isn't quite finished, but it's only a step away from completion. Bring it to a Cannith Reforging Station and combine it with melted materials to restore this item to its full potential.
    • One of the following:
      • Wisdom +13 Wisdom +13: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +13 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
      • Insightful Wisdom +6Insightful Wisdom +6: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +6 insight bonus to Wisdom.
      • Quality Wisdom +3Quality Wisdom +3: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +3 quality bonus to Wisdom.
  • Devotion +148Devotion +148: Passive: +148 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.
  • Nullification +148Nullification +148: Passive: +148 Equipment bonus to Negative (Necrotic) and Poison Spell Power.
  • Wizardry +283 Wizardry +283: +283 Enhancement bonus to spell points.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments

    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

    • Fortification: +25% to +100%

    • Hit points: +4 to +54

    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

    • Named: Category:Colorless augments

    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

  • Magical Sheltering +15 Magical Sheltering +15: +15 Enhancement bonus to Magical Resistance Rating

Legendary Crown of Butterflies
  • Crown of SummerCrown of Summer: You permanently benefit from Crown of Summer.
    Crown of Summer: You have a +15 Positive Healing Amplification, and you gain 10 Melee Power and 5 Ranged Power (all enhancement bonus).
  • Winged AllureWinged Allure: The butterflies of this crown have a tendancy to distract your enemies. When hit or missed in melee combat, your foes have a chance to be Fascinated with no save.
  • Enchantment Focus +5 Enchantment Focus +5: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC of Enchantment spells.
  • Magical Sheltering +33 Magical Sheltering +33: +33 Enhancement bonus to Magical Resistance Rating

  • Crown of SummerCrown of Summer: You permanently benefit from Crown of Summer.
    Crown of Summer: You have a +15 Positive Healing Amplification, and you gain 10 Melee Power and 5 Ranged Power (all enhancement bonus).
  • Extra Smites 2Extra Smites 2: +2 Smite Evil uses per rest. Smite Evil uses regenerate 10% faster.
  • Hallowed +13Hallowed: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Hallowed items provide an +13 Enhancement bonus to the maximum Hit Dice of undead turned.
  • Eternal Holy BurstEternal Holy Burst: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Holy Burst ability. (This weapon is holy. The weapon deals an additional 1 to 6 good damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 good damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.)

  • Faeryfire CurseFaeryfire Curse: Empowered by the Fearylights, your Illusion spells have a chance to curse your enemies with Purple Faery Fire, dispelling stealth, invisibilty, blur, and displacement for 30 seconds, and giving a -40 penalty to hide. Sightless enemies are immune to the dazzle effect.

Crown of Butterflies
  • Crown of SummerCrown of Summer: You permanently benefit from Crown of Summer.
    Crown of Summer: You have a +15 Positive Healing Amplification, and you gain 10 Melee Power and 5 Ranged Power (all enhancement bonus).
  • Winged AllureWinged Allure: The butterflies of this crown have a tendancy to distract your enemies. When hit or missed in melee combat, your foes have a chance to be Fascinated with no save.
  • Enchantment Focus +2 Enchantment Focus +2: +2 Equipment bonus to the DC of Enchantment spells.

Crown of Snow
  • Fire Shield (Cold)Fire Shield (Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.

  • Strength +14 Strength +14: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Legendary Magma Surge GuardLegendary Magma Surge Guard: This item stores the immeasurable heat of the planet's molten mantle. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, causing a tremendous amount of Fire damage to the attacker.
  • Improved Fire Augmentation IXImproved Fire Augmentation IX: Increases the wearer's caster level when casting ninth level or lower Fire spells by three.
  • Fortification +157%Fortification +157%: +157% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Insightful Combat Mastery +6Insightful Combat Mastery +6: +6 Insight bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%: Passive: +11% Insight bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)

  • Major Lesser Dragonmark EnhancementMajor Lesser Dragonmark Enhancement: This will increase the total number of Lesser Dragonmarks you can use by 5. However, these additional Lesser Dragonmarks will only take effect after the wielder rests.

When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, causing a tremendous amount of Fire damage to the attacker.

Legendary Sacred Helm
  • Lifesealed +35Lifesealed +35: You are immune to magical effects that cause instant death. In addition, you have a +35 enhancement bonus to Negative Energy Absorption.
  • Hallowed +13Hallowed: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Hallowed items provide an +13 Enhancement bonus to the maximum Hit Dice of undead turned.
  • Sacred +13Sacred +13: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +13 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.
  • Radiance GuardRadiance Guard: This item is imbued with a brilliant, radiant power. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, the attacker has a chance of being hit by 4d6 points of light damage and has a chance of being blinded.
  • Negative Energy Absorption - 20 Charges (Recharged/Day: 5)Negative Energy Absorption: This effect absorbs negative energy and energy drain effects.

  • Trap the Soul GuardTrap the Soul Guard: This item stores an overwhelming, merciless power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, sucking out the life force of an enemy and imprisoning the essence of their body and soul in a gem.
  • Legendary Nightmare GuardLegendary Nightmare Guard: On being hit or missed, this item has a chance to attempt to fear your enemy, ripping the life from them as if they were struck with a Phantasmal Killer spell. Enemies must make a DC 100 Will save versus the Fear or a DC 100 Fortitude save versus Death or be slain. Even if they make their save versus Death, they may still be feared.

Helm of the Hunter
  • EversightEversight: You benefit from the spell True Seeing and are Immune to Blindness.
  • Druidic Survival MasteryDruidic Survival Mastery: While in Wild Shape, you receive a Primal bonus to damage equal to half the number of Wilderness Lore feats you have.

Firemouth's Diving Helmet
  • Proof Against Disease +4 Proof Against Disease +4: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +4 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 5 + their Fortitude save).

Legendary University Sentry's Helm
  • Resistance +11 Resistance +11: Passive: +11 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Insightful Fortification +76%Insightful Fortification +76%: +76% Insight bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Shield +14Shield +14: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +14 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.
  • Natural Armor +14Natural Armor +14: Passive: +14 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.
  • Lost PurposeLost Purpose: This item is missing some parts that made it unique. Perhaps you can fix that at a Cannith Repurposing Station.

University Champion's Helm
  • Deadly +7 Deadly +7: +7 Competence bonus to weapon damage.
  • Accuracy +14 Accuracy +14: Passive: +14 Competence bonus to attack rolls
  • Armor-Piercing - 14% Armor-Piercing - 14%: Passive: +14% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Seeker +9 Seeker +9: Provides a +9 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +9 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Lost PurposeLost Purpose: This item is missing some parts that made it unique. Perhaps you can fix that at a Cannith Repurposing Station.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 18 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Party 101 End chest
Legendary University Champion's Helm
  • Deadly +11 Deadly +11: +11 Competence bonus to weapon damage.
  • Accuracy +22 Accuracy +22: Passive: +22 Competence bonus to attack rolls
  • Armor-Piercing - 22% Armor-Piercing - 22%: Passive: +22% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Seeker +14 Seeker +14: Provides a +14 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +14 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Lost PurposeLost Purpose: This item is missing some parts that made it unique. Perhaps you can fix that at a Cannith Repurposing Station.

    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)

    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

  • Spell Focus Mastery +3 Spell Focus Mastery +3: +3 Equipment bonus to the DC of all spells.
  • Wizardry +178 Wizardry +178: +178 Enhancement bonus to spell points.
  • Potency +68Potency +68: Passive: +68 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.
